detail_desc: Top in light, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a motif. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a textured cotton knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper knitted in soft, fluffy yarn with a V-neck front and back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a top, leggings and hairband. Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and flounced trim at the front that continues over the shoulders. Leggings and hairband in soft cotton jersey. Hairband with a bow at the front.
Tube scarf in a soft rib knit. Width 30 cm, circumference approx. 125 cm.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Set with a hooded jacket and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. Jacket with a pile-lined hood, zip down the front and heart-shaped front pockets. Joggers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut top in jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck and short, frill-trimmed sleeves.
Short shorts in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a high, elasticated waist and drawstring with twisted, tasselled ties. Side pockets and inset hemstitching at the hems.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg.

Set with a hat and mittens in a soft cable knit containing some wool. Hat with a faux fur pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Mittens with foldover ribbing. Both hat and mittens have a fleece lining.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with creases, a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed cotton jersey with a turtle neck and short sleeves.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Tube scarf in patterned jersey that can also be used as a headband. Length 45 cm, circumference 50 cm.
Short crushed velvet shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, pleats at the front and side pockets.
Slim-fit jeans in different colours of superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and narrow hems.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.

Bikini top with a decorative tie detail at the front, lightly padded cups with removable inserts, side support and a silicone trim at the top. Detachable ties at the back of the neck and a fastening at the back.

Shirt in stretch Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and a yoke and darts at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with uneven, raw-edge hems.

Joggers in woven fabric with a sheen. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Tapered legs with visible seams at the knees and covered elastication at the hems.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Ankle boots in imitation suede with round toes, a zip at one side, a tab with an adjustable metal buckle at the other, and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 3 cm.
Gloves in soft leather with a soft, fine-knit lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a slightly deeper neckline.
Large earrings made from various sizes of round, embossed metal discs. Length approx. 9.5 cm.
V-neck body in soft, ribbed jersey with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Fitted top in sturdy, ribbed cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in patterned cotton jersey with elastication at the top, short, wide sleeves and a seam and wide flounce at the hem.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.
Shopper in imitation leather with two handles and a drawstring at the top. One side pocket and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 9x31x45 cm.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and rounded hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.

Lounge set in soft sweatshirt fabric. Long-sleeved top in a short style with a ribbed neckline and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Top in soft, pleated jersey with a slight sheen. V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, an elasticated seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist, and long balloon sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs.

Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with crossover shoulder straps with an adjustable fastening at the front. Kangaroo pocket with sewn-on ears, elastication at the back, and ribbed hems. Partly lined.
5-pocket, high-waisted trousers in washed stretch twill with a zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Sleeveless top in lightly crêped jersey with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, decorative seams and asymmetric, raw-edge hems.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved Henley tops in soft cotton jersey with a button placket. Open chest pocket in woven fabric.
Set with a hat and scarf in a soft knit. Hat with a pompom on the top.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and straight legs with raw-edge hems.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, padded hood. Zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, side pockets with a press-stud and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with short sleeves. Elastication and a drawstring at the sides for a gently draped effect.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with an extra-high waist. Slightly looser fit with straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Tunic in a crinkled cotton weave with embroidery. V-neck with ties at the neckline, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Striped rugby shirt in cotton jersey with a cotton twill collar, concealed button placket, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and short slits in the sides.

Long dress in billowing organza with a double-layered stand-up collar and opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Voluminous, elbow-length balloon sleeves in a double layer with a shorter inner layer that has concealed elastication to create added volume in the sleeves. Relaxed fit with a seam at the knees and a wide, flounced hem. Detachable, short underdress in a viscose weave with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and long puff sleeves.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Knee-length shirt dress in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, double, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Wide, ankle-length dress in a Tencel™ lyocell weave. High collar with decorative stitching, covered buttons at the top and wide raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered at the back and a seam with a wide, sewn-on tie belt at the waist. Straight fit with soft draping to the hem and a slit at the front. Longer at the back. Unlined.

Dungarees in washed denim with a chest pocket and wide straps with metal fasteners at the top. Front and back pockets, smaller pockets on one leg and a loop on the other. Seam at the waist with buttons at the sides, a fake fly, and wide, straight legs. The cotton content of the dungarees is partly recycled.
Sandals in grained imitation leather with crossover straps at the front. Moulded imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
T-shirt in soft jersey with embroidered appliqués.

Backpack in woven fabric with a handle and adjustable, padded shoulder straps. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Padded back plate and base. Lined. Size 13.5x28.5x43 cm.
Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.3 cm to 2 cm.
Slingbacks with pointed toes, covered heels and a heel strap with covered elastication. Leather insoles. Heel approx. 5.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbed neckline.
Leather sandals with an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastener. Leather insoles and rubber soles.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8x-12xY), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with an extra high waist, button fly and straight legs.
Sleeveless dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Fine-knit trainer socks in various colours.
Large scarf in a soft weave with short fringes along the edges.

Joggers in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, and flap back and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
